data: The note "New Project: AI Chatbot Concept" identifies exploration of an AI-driven chatbot to improve customer support.
The note "New Project: AI Chatbot Concept" records a requirement to integrate the chatbot with the existing CRM.
The note "New Project: AI Chatbot Concept" specifies the need for 24/7 availability of the chatbot.
The note "New Project: AI Chatbot Concept" highlights multi-language support as a key feature.
The note "New Project: AI Chatbot Concept" summarizes the initial brainstorming focus on integration and features for the AI chatbot project.
The note "New Project: AI Chatbot Concept" situates the AI chatbot initiative within the business context of customer support automation.
The note "New Project: AI Chatbot Concept" documents consideration of aligning the chatbot project with CRM systems and the support team.
